pages.text:
JOIN OUR TEAM
Interested in being a part of the Doxa crew? We’re looking for baristas who have an interest in specialty coffee and in educating others about this incredible industry.
The best way to be considered for a position is to be a regular customer at Doxa so you can get to know us, and introduce yourself to our team so we can get to know you!
Next, fill out the short application below and send a copy of your resume to info@doxacoffee.co to apply.
Applicants who do not email a copy of their resume upon submitting an application will not be considered for our team.
EMAIL US

*

*

*

*

*

*
Thank you for your interest in joining our team! If you haven’t already, please send a copy of your resume to info@doxacoffee.co
